abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation Director James B Comey says there is no evidence of connection between anyone in United States and Paris terrorist attacks, and no threat of attacks in US; in rare joint appearance with Atty Gen Loretta E Lynch, Comey promises vigilance in preventing copycat efforts by known terror suspects.
lead_paragraph: The agency has also found no evidence that terrorism similar to those in Paris are planned in the United States.

headline.main: F.B.I. Director Says No Paris Attacks Link to U.S. Is Seen
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Director Says No Link to U.S. Is Seen

snippet: The agency has also found no evidence that terrorism similar to those in Paris are planned in the United States.
